basics.name: Emma Sharp
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I'm pursuring a BBA in Management Information Systems at the University of Hawai'i at Mānoa. I'm on track to graduate in the fall of 2024.

work.summary: Head of Marketing for the company
highlights: Examine the private and commercial profit potential of the company’s embedded operations software for robotics, iCOSMOS, including spacecraft, aerial, ground, and submersible vehicle applications
Identify potential customer bases, government and civilian, for Interstel’s aerospace operations software

work.summary: Head of company advertisement and development
highlights: Implemented search engine optimization strategies to improve website visibility and performance
Measured and analyzed the behavior of customers on various website and point of sale interfaces

volunteer.summary: Crewmember and sailing student onboard S/Y Vela
highlights: Lived aboard and helped crew a sailboat through 9 countries and 3,500 nautical miles in the Caribbean
Earned multiple nautical science related certifications, including International Sail Crew, VHF Radio Communication, and Navigation Master
Member, Information Technology Management Association, UH Mānoa, 2022-Present
Member, International Business Organization, UH Mānoa, 2022-Present
Member, American Association of Undergraduate Women, UH Mānoa, 2022-Present

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Scholarly award for students who demonstrate academic excellance based on their GPA
